alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 445 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over The Redland, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Homestead Miami Speedway, Homestead General Airport, The Redland, Kendall, Florida City, Naranja, Princeton, Richmond West, Country Walk, Leisure City, Zoo Miami, The Hammocks, The Crossings, Goulds, Homestead Base, Richmond Heights, Inlikita, Three Lakes and South Miami Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
